item.title: Zero Trust — Not a Buzzword
item.description: Over the last few years, Zero Trust, a term coined by Forrester, picked up a lot of steam. Zero Trust, in its core, is a network architecture and security framework focusing on not having a distinction between external and internal access environments, and never trusting users/roles.

item.title: Join us for DaprCon October 19th-20th 2021
item.description: As we previously announced, the first DaprCon will take place on October 19th-20th! In this post, we’ll share some more details on the content and speakers. DaprCon will include a variety of content including a keynote, technical sessions, panel discussions and real-world experiences of adopters building with Dapr. Streaming DaprCon DaprCon is a fully virtual event that will be streamed on YouTube and attendance is free! To watch the live events just follow these two links:

item.title: Three hours to save Integral
item.description: On 22 September, around midday, ESA’s Integral spacecraft went into emergency Safe Mode. One of the spacecraft’s three active ‘reaction wheels’ had turned off without warning and stopped spinning, causing a ripple effect that meant the satellite itself began to rotate.
